bonuses.name: Arcane Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

dr.name: Draenei
description:
Draenei

Units:
+5% hit points
-10% attack rate
-5% evasion
+30% buy cost
+30% buy cooldown

Buildings:
Tower/Barracks have Mana Shield
No HP regeneration

Upgrades:
+3Lv Building Damage

Magic:
Sacred Shield (+5 armor to 1 unit)
Holy Light (100 HP to 1 unit)
Resurrection (revives 1 unit)

Traits: Strong and durable units that are rendered even stronger by healing and protecting effects of the Holy Light. No real weaknesses apart from the scarse population making each unit very costly.

Difficulty: Advanced

Draenei

Units:
+5% hit points
-5% evasion
+30% buy cost
+10% buy cooldown

Buildings:
Tower/Barracks have Mana Shield
No HP regeneration

Upgrades:
+3Lv Building Damage

Magic:
Sacred Shield (+5 armor to 1 unit)
Holy Light (100 HP to 1 unit)
Resurrection (revives 1 unit)

Traits: Strong and durable units that are rendered even stronger by healing and protecting effects of the Holy Light. No real weaknesses apart from the scarse population making each unit very costly.

Difficulty: Advanced

bonuses.name: Vindicator Class [Q]
bonuses.description:
Vindictus replaces A'dal

Special Unit (Melee/Mechanical/Air)
-20% buy cooldown
Can attack only buildings and Heroes
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher
Can learn:
Crystallization (Disable Spell)
18-30 sec stun
(450-750 area of effect)
(doesn't affect Special unit)
Arkonite Lance (Passive Skill)
launches 1-7 beams at units
Purifier Beam (Damage Spell)
25-40 damage/sec
(350-400 area of effect)
(doesn't affect buildings)
Warp In (Summoning Spell)
summons up to 5-9 random units

Type: Late Game Push

heroes.name: Tinker
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Demolisher

Can learn:
Cluster Rockets (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in an area
(125-275 area of effect)

Pocket Tower (Summoning Spell)
summons 2 immobile units

Demolition Aura (Disable Aura)
4-10 building armor reduction

Repair (Healing Spell)
300-600 HP to 5 units
(affects mechanical units only)

heroes.name: Tinker
heroes.description:

Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

225-375 damage in an area

Pocket Tower (Summoning Spell)

2-8 armor reduction
(to buildings and mechanical units)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Repair (Healing Spell)
300-600 HP to 5 units
(affects mechanical units only)

heroes.name: Crown Prince
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs Heroes
Weak Vs All Units, Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Critical Strike (Passive Skill)
15-25% to do 4x damage

Honor Guard (Summoning Spell)
summons 4 Stormwind Knights

Banner of Stormwind (Summoning Spell)
30% damage bonus for 20-30 sec

Battlefield Glory (Passive Skill)
4000-10000 HP heal after Hero kill

heroes.name: King of the Alliance
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Hybrid

Can learn:
Blades of Fury (Self Spell)
+300% AS after a kill for 3-4 sec

Taunt (Disable Spell)
8 sec taunt and +20 armor
(550-700 area of effect)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lion's Shield (Passive Skill)
35% to block 30-60 damage

Colossus Smash (Passive Skill)
15% to do 3-5x damage
(affects Heroes only)

heroes.name: Siege Tower
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Rain of Arrows (Damage Spell)
70-100 damage/sec for 5 sec
(600-900 area of effect)

Troop Garrison (Passive Skill)
launches 1-7 missiles at units

Troop Transporter (Summoning Spell)
summons up to 5-9 random units

Composite Armor (Passive Skill)
30-36% to block 30-60 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Banner of Lordaeron
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in every 2nd wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Long Weapon (2x damage)
25%/30%/35%/40% chance on attack
(affects strong creeps only)
Lv2: has Battle Cry (bonus damage)
+15%/+20%/+25% damage in 400 AoE
Lv3: has Lordaeron Banner (on death)
+15%/+20% attack rate in 500 AoE
Lv4: has Hold the Line (bonus armor)
+6 armor to other units in 100 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Banner of Lordaeron
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in every 2nd wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Long Weapon (3x damage)
25%/30%/35%/40% chance on attack
(affects strong creeps only)
Lv2: has Battle Cry (bonus damage)
+15%/+20%/+25% damage in 400 AoE
Lv3: has Lordaeron Banner (on death)
+15%/+20% attack rate in 500 AoE
Lv4: has Hold the Line (bonus armor)
+6 armor to other units in 100 AoE

nb.name: Nightborne
description:
Nightborne

Units:
15% spell damage reduction
-5% attack rate
-5% hit points
+30% buy cooldown
No mana regeneration

Buildings:
+12.5% mana

Upgrades:
+1Lv Magic

Traits: Very proficient in magic and arcane arts. All units have mana and can cast spells. However, they do not regenerate mana and need to steal it from the enemy. No Air unit or Artillery.

Difficulty: Expert

Nightborne

Units:
15% spell damage reduction
-5% attack rate
-5% hit points
+10% buy cooldown
No mana regeneration

Buildings:
+12.5% mana

Upgrades:
+1Lv Magic

Traits: Very proficient in magic and arcane arts. All units have mana and can cast spells. However, they do not regenerate mana and need to steal it from the enemy. No Air unit or Artillery.

Difficulty: Expert

ng.name: Naga
description:
Naga

Units:
+2 armor
+30% buy cooldown

Buildings:
+2 armor
-10% hit points

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Armor

Magic:
Abolish Magic (dispels buffs from 1 unit)
Silence (silences for 15 sec in 175 AoE)
Mana Burn (burns 250 mana to 1 unit)

Traits: Strong units that are proficient both in ancient arcane arts and physical combat. Specializes in magic neutralization. No foothold in surface world means weak base defence and low unit supplies.

Difficulty: Skilled

or.name: Orc
description:
Orc

Units:
+12% damage

Buildings:
+20% damage

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Traits: Basic at a first glance, but actually far more tricky to play. Easy to learn, but difficult to master. Very buff and aura dependent race. Augments troop damage output with blind rage and frenzy.

Difficulty: Skilled

Orc

Units:
+12% damage

Buildings:
+20% damage

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Magic:
Bloodlust (+15% attack rate to 1 unit)
Purge (removes buffs from 1 unit)
Chain Lightning (175 damage to 6 units)

Traits: Basic at a first glance, but actually far more tricky to play. Easy to learn, but difficult to master. Very buff and aura dependent race. Augments troop damage output with blind rage and frenzy.

Difficulty: Skilled

upgrades.name: Arcanite Tips
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+4 Scout damage
+8 Wind Rider damage
+15 Guard Tower damage
+15 Barracks damage

upgrades.name: Arcanite Tips
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+4 Scout damage
+8 Wind Rider damage
+10 Guard Tower damage
+10 Barracks damage

bonuses.name: Frostwolf Elites [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Seasoned Troops
+1 level of Ensnare

Reduces spell damage to Grunt, Scout, Shaman and Wolf Rider by 20%. Increases their hit points by 25.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Frostwolf Elites [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Burning Oil

Reduces spell damage to Grunt, Scout, Shaman, Wolf Rider and Frost Wolf by 20%. Increases their hit points by 25.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Orb of Lightning [W]
bonuses.description:
Increases Grunt, Shaman and Wolf Rider attack rate by 5% and gives them 10%/13%/16%/19% chance to deal 20/25/30/35 damage up to 4 units.
(can be upgraded in this building)

Type: Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Orb of Lightning [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Power Overwhelming

Increases Grunt, Shaman and Wolf Rider attack rate by 5% and gives them 10%/13%/16%/19% chance to deal 30/35/40/45 damage up to 4 units.
(can be upgraded in this building)

Type: Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Frost Wolf [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Feral Instincts

Chosen barracks will spawn +2 units
(can capture neutral buildings)
Abilities:
Feral Roar (Support Spell)
(+20% damage in 500 AoE)
(affects organic units only)
Upgrades used:
Arcanite Blades
Arcanite Armor
Feral Instincts
Battle Frenzy

Type: Single Lane Focus

bonuses.name: Shadow Wolf [D]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Wolf Bonding

Shadow Wolf replaces Wolf Rider
Siege Unit (Invisible)
+6 damage
+50 HP
Abilities:

(3x damage to Heroes)
(attacks cannot miss)
Upgrades used:
Shamanism
Arcanite Armor
Battle Frenzy
Endurance Aura
Feral Beasts

Type: Anti Hero

+1 level of Pillage

Frostwolf Ravager replaces Grunt
Melee Unit
-10% attack rate
+8 damage
+2 armor
Abilities:

Spellcaster

(affects organic units only)

(affects organic units only)

Lv4: +20/+36 max damage, 20 sec ensnare

deals 2x/2.5x/3x/3.5x damage
(affects organic non-Hero units only)

(affects organic units only)
Lv3: has Howl of Terror (damage debuff)

(affects organic non-Hero units only)
Lv4: has Deafening Roar (slow for 6 sec)
-25% speed in 400 AoE
(affects organic units only)
